name: VoteBoss
0:
”Alexa, launch Vote Boss”
”Alexa, ask Vote Boss to set categories movies and sports”
”Alexa, ask Vote Boss to vote Movies”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vote boss
des:
"Vote Boss" is a skill that lets you keep score, vote, or count items. Set and add categories. Tally numbers. Keep track of totals!

Sample commands:

"Set categories horror and drama" (Will reset the current categories. Max 2)
"Add category: comedy"
"List categories"
"Cancel [last vote]"
"Vote for comedy"
"Add one to horror"
"What's the total?"

Simple app to track totals.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
